attributes.action: Boycott the world cup in South Africa 2010
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The ANC government has neglected to protect the citizens in the country, daily thousands of people are getting killed, raped and brutally tortured for just being at the wrong place and time. While the country does not ‘have the funds’ the ministers are flying around in private jets and go on elaborate holidays. Irrelevant of colour and class, people struggle. Crime statistics tampering and with holding information from the media are used by the ANC government to give the world a false sense of safety. In 2010 thousands of innocent sports fans are going to South Africa, unknowingly walking into a country that are just (or more) as dangerous as IRAQ. Please we urge the British government – as British citizens to at least warn people about the dangerous situation they are going into.
